member.name: T:Polymorph.Unity.Core.AquireDriveThroughSemaphore
member.summary: Aquire a semaphore that kills the currently running coroutine, and let this coroutine through

member.name: T:Polymorph.Unity.Core.AquireFirewallSemaphore
member.summary: Aquire a semaphore that kills this coroutine, if another one is running

member.name: T:Polymorph.Unity.Core.CoroutineHolder
member.summary: All coroutines created by AdvancedBehavoiurs will run on a seperate object with this component attached to it
